name: Arcadius: Arcade Champ
description:
Arcadius is a work in progress, it's not finished but I hope to take this project in a fun, wacky direction!

I recently played Enviro-Bear 2000 (Extremely fun game) and thought to myself that I would like to make a similar game with a slight bit more functionality. I decided to make a Bully/ Enviro-Bear crossover in First Person! So I thought that it would be fun to have the player play as a guy or girl going through an arcade beating the sh%$ out of kids (Capsule shaped things (So far)) and robbing their drinks and food AND taking their go at the arcade from them! The aim of the game is to have as much food, drinks and fun as possible FOR FREE!

I have 3 UI bars that fill when… you've guessed it... eat, drink and click on the working arcade machines (for fun).

Eventually I hope to have models for the kids and actual playable arcade games but for now there is this…

Tell me what you think in the comments!

Maybe post an idea or a direction you'd like to see me take the game? :D
